alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 11:52PM CDT until October 05 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Freestone County in central Texas... South central Henderson County in central Texas... Western Anderson County in central Texas... Southeastern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1151 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kerens to Streetman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palestine, Fairfield, Kerens, Trinidad, Navarro, Fairfield Lake, Montalba, Coon Creek Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Trinidad Lake, Fairfield Lake State Park, Cross Roads, Mildred, Eureka, Streetman, Goodlow, Tucker, Bradford, Bois D`arc and Cayuga. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 199 and 217. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
